name: Stage Group (p)
title: TNM 7 Stage Group
notes:
**Note 1:** The Stage Groups displayed are the enhanced UICC groups.  If your registry submits the directly assigned Stage Groups to agencies other than SEER, please check the AJCC manual to ensure you are using the appropriate logic.

**Note 2 :** Serum Tumor Markers are used to calculate S Stage.  They can be found in the following site-specific factors:  
  
     SSF 13: Post-Orchiectomy Alpha Fetoprotein (AFP) Range  
     SSF 15: Post-Orchiectomy Human Chorionic Gonadotropin (hCG) Range  
     SSF 16: Post-Orchiectomy Lactate Dehydrogenase (LDH) Range  
  
The S Stage is set using the following logic:  

     SX - Serum marker studies not available  
     S0 - Serum marker study levels within normal limits  
     S1 - LDH: < 1.5 x N   AND   hCG: < 5000   AND   AFP < 1000  
     S2 - LDH: 1.5 to 10 x N   OR   hCG: 5000 to 50,000   OR   AFP: 1000 to 10,000  
     S3 - LDH: > 10 x N   OR   hCG: > 50,000   OR   AFP: > 10,000
